name: Bear Trap (MaxStudios, ar-ninetysix, Epicshaner)
description:
Controls: WASD for movement, traps are placed automatically

Your sight is limited in the dark forest where a bloodthirsty bear is always following you. You will automatically craft traps and drop them where you stand, capable of hurting the bear or catching rabbits that will provide meat to eat. Watch your step though as traps can also activate on yourself.
